comments: Adebayo (MIA) firms up over his right foot as he establishes himself in Brunson's (NYK) path and does not deliver contact during the pick.
Robinson (NYK) avoids making contact with Adebayo's (MIA) arm as he contests the pass.
Adebayo (MIA) rests his hands on Robinson's (NYK) sides before disengaging and marginal contact occurs off-ball.
Brunson (NYK) maintains his left foot as his pivot as he comes to a stop during the drive.
Butler (MIA) is moving alongside Randle's (NYK) path and marginal body contact occurs as they come together during the drive.
Butler (MIA) makes clean contact with the ball as he deflects it away from Robinson (NYK).
Robinson (NYK) is in the lane for longer than three seconds.
The ball is last touched by Adebayo (MIA) before going out of bounds.

call_type: Turnover:  Out of Bounds - Bad Pass Turn
comments: The ball is last touched by Randle (NYK) before going out of bounds.
Hart (NYK) reaches for the loose ball and marginal contact occurs with Butler's (MIA) left arm during the rebound.
Randle (NYK) momentarily ties the ball up in Butler's (MIA) hands and marginal arm contact occurs.
Hart (NYK) has a hand on the ball when Butler (MIA) pulls it away from him and marginal arm contact occurs that does not affect his shot attempt at the basket.

Adebayo (MIA) reaches for the ball as Randle (NYK) backs him down in the post and marginal contact occurs with his head as the two come together. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Butler (MIA) exits the paint within three seconds.
Adebayo (MIA) legally contests Randle's (NYK) jump shot, making "high-five" contact after the ball is released.
Herro (MIA) goes to, not through, Quickley's (NYK) space before releasing away for the in-bounds pass and marginal contact occurs off-ball.
Adebayo (MIA) firms up over his right foot as he establishes himself in Quickley's (NYK) path and does not deliver contact during the pick.
Replay review of the foul called on Quickley (NYK) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Quickley initiates contact to Herro (MIA) with a hand to the front.
Robinson (NYK) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Herro (MIA) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Randle (NYK).
Randle (NYK) slides his left hand across and off Herro's (MIA) front as Herro dislodges the ball and marginal contact occurs during the steal.
Adebayo (MIA) and Hart (NYK) mutually engage and disengage with one another and marginal contact occurs off-ball.

Randle (NYK) moves alongside Herro's (MIA) path with a bent forearm along Herro's side and marginal contact occurs during the driving shot attempt. Randle then makes incidental "high-five" contact occurs with Herro's left hand after the release.
Hart (NYK) raises his arm and brings it towards Herro (MIA) to contest the driving shot attempt and marginal arm contact occurs.
Oladipo (MIA) is sliding toward Brunson's (NYK) path and marginal body contact occurs as the two come together on the perimeter.
Martin (MIA) is actively guarding Robinson (NYK) within three seconds of entering the lane.
Adebayo (MIA) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Butler (MIA) makes clean contact with the ball and cleanly dislodges it away from Randle (NYK) prior to any incidental contact occurring thereafter.
Martin (MIA) is actively guarding Robinson (NYK) within three seconds of entering the lane.
Herro (MIA) avoids making body contact with Randle (NYK) as he contests the jump shot attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) reaches at the ball and marginal arm contact occurs with Robinson's (NYK) right arm.
